review_text:
The house is all remodel, the TV room can be bedroom.
All was super clean and the comunication was excellent. I'll stay again without hesitation.

The Arthhouse was in a great location, right near everything. The beds were comfortable and the listing was as described. The hosts reached out multiple times to make sure we had what we needed. All in all, we had a good stay.

As I said there were storms in the area and he communicated tips to stay safe and protect our property.
If I had to nitpick, there is plenty of seating at the kitchen table and dining area table, but only 2 chairs in the living area to watch tv.
Good home-base for Knox College events. We enjoyed our stay!

We enjoyed our stay at this 1895 Victorian style home. The rooms were clean and amenities were as listed. We enjoyed the character of the home and the surrounding community. We enjoyed a walk around the neighborhood and met a local woman who lives a few doors down founded the non profit Community Glo. She is converting her lawn to a community garden. Very cool!
Thank you for providing a relaxing space for families who prefer not to stay in a cramped hotel room. -Julie B.
Galesburg Isa friendly town. The hosts were great.
Very clean, easy check in, great communication! Would stay again!
Comfortable stay for our family of 4!

One of the best decisions I have made. We needed a place for guest to stay and also have my daughter’s baby shower. Boudewijn was very accommodating and helpful. My two daughters, granddaughter and two of her friends stayed on site so we didn’t have to get a hotel. The baby shower was great and the BNB was the perfect venue. It was a win/win situation.

Boudewijn & Cecilia Arthouse was more than I expected ! A great stay for me to come visit my girlfriend since we live in two different states.The place was very clean ,felt like home.I only used the first floor level .The first floor level bed was firm and comfortable and clean.Shower was hot and clean.Thermostat was a little confusing at first but both hosts assisted and answered any questions not only about the Thermostat but any questions I had in a timely fashion ,I appreciate both hosts because this place housed a first time meeting between two people who love each other! Thank you so much ,more than words can express. Excellent home for any occasion!
Perfect!
Serene! Thanks for the quiet getaway!
Beautiful and peaceful!!!
We had a wonderful relaxing time. The scenery was beautiful with all the wildlife.

This is a wonderful place to relax and has many food supplies so you don’t have to bring every thing in your kitchen with you. It is always clean, has a nice grill, has nice little lake for fishing, and has a small boat with trolling motor to use. All fish you catch must be returned to the lake or a small lake like this will be quickly fished out. Craig and Neneth make your visit very enjoyable and that is why we return every year.

I can't say enough good things about this place. Pictures don't do it justice. The lake, the kayak, the john boat, the view, the wildlife, all such an amazing trip. The house was spotless and had everything we needed for adventuring. We are already talking about when we can come back.
Peaceful place to escape for a few days to reconnect to nature .

The best thing I can say about Craig & Nineth’s home is this was our 3rd visit and we can’t wait for our next visit. The beauty of the property, the peace and quiet, the comfort and cleanliness of the home and the amazing hospitality of the owners make this our favorite home away from home!

We had a wonderful weekend escape from the craziness of life. Was a great place to disconnect and just enjoy nature. Loved waking up and going outside on the screened deck to hear the birds in the morning. The property is lovely. Felt very private despite close proximity to main house. Loved all of the amenities in the house, had everything needed to cook a few meals. Would love to stay again some day, would love to see property in later spring or summer when everything is green and it's warmer.

Craig is a great host with a beautiful property. This was our 3rd visit, and it was just as lovely as the last two. check-in and check-out are easy and convenient. the house is always impeccably clean with good amenities like appliances, basic condiments, and bottled water. We will book with Craig again!
We have stayed with Craig several times. It was great again and is always absolutely perfect. We are planning our next stay already.

We have stayed with Craig several time and it has never disappointed us in any way. Super quite and clean. The internet is great if you need to work or play. They always have basic items to use to get you started. We already have our next stay scheduled. Thanks for being such a great host.

A beautiful cabin with gorgeous views. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The views and privacy was really nice. We were there to visit with our son so we didn’t get to enjoy all the amenities offered but could easily spend a long weekend just hanging around the house and enjoying them. Great place and hosts!

We have been to this location several times over the years. it is a great, peaceful getaway for me and my wife. The hosts are very accommodating and friendly. They continue to make updates to the cabin and the property. The place is well kept and has everything we need to enjoy your time. The fishing was fantastic, and the hiking trails are well maintained. There is plenty of wildlife to go around and enjoy. If you are interested in getting away to relax this location is ideal.

We have stayed here several times because it fits exactly what at we are looking for in a resort. It has beautiful peaceful surroundings with a well kept house and friendly hosts to work with. We enjoy fishing and the lake usually cooperative for that. We only have to bring our own food as the kitchen is fully stocked with everything we need. It is just a wonderful places to stay.
What a beautiful piece of paradise! The guesthouse was beautiful, clean & very well stocked. Craig was very responsive. We had a wonderful time!

The property was just what we were looking for. Craig and Neneth have thought about all the things a visitor might need. The rooms were well-appointed and, it looks, recently updated. The property was well taken care of, which is difficult with so many acres. We took a morning walk and were able to see a doe with her fawn and a raccoon headed to its den for the day. I was so pleased with our stay!

I can't say enough good things about my stay! Craig and Naneth were wonderful. They greeted me when I arrived, treated me to some delightful garden produce and a nice tour of the home.
From that point on I did not see them again. They were very respectful of my stay and aside from them telling me they would be there and to let them know if I needed anything, I felt as if I were alone on the property. It was wonderful, peaceful, and very relaxing! I highly recommend if you are looking to get away from the hustle and bustle and enjoy the quiet of the country!
A very charming and peaceful location. The place was VERY clean. Kitchen was well stocked with essentials. Would definitely stay here again.
Everything about our stay was great! The house were wonderful. The cabin and surrounding area was wonderful.

If you just need to get to a quiet place and enjoy peace of mind in a tranquil setting this place is perfect my wife particilarly loved the sounds of nature at night ... The screened in patio area was perfection.. A wonderful little slice of country heaven

We had a lovely stay with Craig and Neneth! It was a beautiful, quiet property- perfect for a break from the city. They were available for anything needed but also also ensured we had privacy. We hope to return sometime soon!

Craig and Neneth's place was incredible! It was a gorgeous place to spend two relaxing nights.
Our GPS was a little wonky getting there, it actually took us past the place, but Craig was so responsive that we were able to figure it out quickly, with no time lost.
We cooked a lot and the kitchen was great! It had basic spices and anything else you may need, although you may want to bring a sharp knife with you.
They provided flower guides and posters with local birds to recognize. They also had bug spray which we used for our walk around the property.
It was a fantastic visit and we hope to go back!

We enjoyed our stay. Craig was helpful and accommodating. The place is very clean and organized.
We recommend this place for those looking for a great and relaxing retreat. We will definitely come back.

Enjoyed our short summer stay at this tranquil getaway. Highly recommend staying here; Craig was lovely and so helpful and attentive, ensuring ease of check-in and if I had any questions. Gorgeous lake and a magical night walk through the forest trails.
And we would definitely come back in the future.

By far the cleanest and most well appointed Airbnb I’ve stayed at. They have everything you could want or need stocked up, from olive oil to bug spray. Craig and Neneth were super nice. Craig gave us a tour of the place when we got there, and that was the last we saw of him lol. You’d never know they lived next door. The lake house is definitely secluded and quiet. We went there for the 4th of July to get away from the fireworks and it was perfect for that. The Jon boat with electric motor was great and we caught plenty of fish. I walked through the woods around the property almost everyday, which was relaxing. T-mobile service is 50% non-existent and 50% 1 bar. They do have wi-fi but it is slow, and you’ll have to bring a device if you want to stream anything on tv because they only have satellite tv service. The only thing I’d change is the mattress was a bit firm for me. I can definitely see why people stay here over and over again. I probably will too!

This place is magical. Stay here!! You won’t regret it.
Inside is immaculately clean.
Outside is spiritual. Enjoy the sounds of nature and the hiking trails. Perfect.

What a lovely, peaceful retreat! The house was the best stocked of all vacation rentals I have ever been in. Criag thinks of everything - lots of cold water bottles in the frig, picnic supplies for our group dinner - you name it, they either have it or will lend it to you from their home next door. We felt very welcomed while they also gave us privacy - the perfect combo. The only downside were the gnats (we were the in early June). They we pretty prolific and made the idea of enjoying the lake and the walking trails less appealing. But I understand they don't stay long. I highly recommend Craig's place.
Craigs and Neneth have a gorgeous place. Very quiet and peaceful. We will be back.

Craig and Neneth are wonderful hosts and their cooking facilities in the cabin are always very clean and well kept. Sitting on the deck and looking out over the lake and beautiful flowered grounds is so relaxing. They even provide paths to take walks through the woods. The boats and docks on the lake are in good working order and easy to use. There were gnats this week for the first time but they had spray available or even head covers available. Everything in the house that you will need is available and well planned. You only need to bring your own food.and drink. We always enjoy our stay and always look forward to coming again.
We have stayed here multiple times and always worth it. Love the view and only hearing nature all day and night.

This was our second stay, and it was every bit as homey and comfortable as the previous year. The hosts are very thoughtful about providing kitchen accessories, bathroom necessities, and plenty of clean towels and blankets.

The third time we have stayed with Craig. Everything was great and Craig responded within minutes via the Air BNB app. It is a touch remote but still only 12 minutes to Abingdon. We had great breakfasts at Caroline's and a fun time bowling at Abbey Lanes. We will be back if Craig will have us.
Great stay, as always!
Wonderful stay every time. Such a gracious host and an amazing place.

This is the only AirBnB we have ever been to but it is clean and comfortable and the host and his wife are terrific people to work with. This is our third visit and I couldn’t ask for a nicer place to visit. We are coming back again next year.
Awesome quiet, clean and comfortable. Enjoyed a walk around the pond. Spotted deer, wood ducks and enjoyed beautiful landscaping and wild plants. Home decorated with wildlife ID pictures and books.

A+ stay. 6 of us stayed comfortably with so much room for cooking, board games, walks, kayaking etc. The guest home has it all! Bring all your food and booze before you get there. C- grocer is 15min away and the A+ grocer is 30min away. Take advantage of all the amenities. The grounds are gorgeous and a great getaway from the city life.

This property is amazing and the host Craig is very nice as well. He gave us a personal tour of the property and they had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. The kids had a blast playing in the swing, hiking through the forest seeing deer and playing near the lake. However, the best hit was kayaking and boating in the private lake. It was peaceful and refreshing to stay in such a beautifuland peaceful place! Definitely want to go back there again with more time to spend there.

Only great things to say about staying at Craig and Neneth’s guest house. It’s a perfect location for a true. We spent time enjoying the screened in porch, getting lost in the trails, and enjoying the boats. The kitchen had everything we needed. We hope to come back to see the property in different seasons!

“Nature At Its Finest!” Unbelievable Flower Garden’s… Natures Trails…. Private Lake!!! Such a Beautiful & Spiritual Awakening…. “It was an A’Maz’ing “Mother-Daughter-Granddaughter Retreat Weekend!” This was the Perfect Place to reflect on all of Our Life’s Blessings…. Swimming, Fishing, Kayaking, Boating, Hiking, Wildlife “&” more!!! The house was perfect! Everything for us & more. The screened in porch was sooo picturesque! We “Will” be back!!! What a Great Find “&” EASY to get to👍🎉

What a wonderful place! We enjoyed beathtaking views, private walking trails, sounds of nature, all while restoring peace of mind.
Everything one could need was available. All we had to bring was food to cook and anything we wanted to drink. Next time, and there will be a next time, we will plan for a longer stay.
Thanks so much, Craig, for listing this hidden gem.
Deb & Jon
The location was very nice and quiet. Everything was clean and tidy and the host was very welcoming.
The place was great as it always is.
We love Craig’s guest house. It is the perfect location for a relaxing weekend!
Great 2 bedroom cabin. Bey clean and accommodating. They views and property are beautiful. It is a great place to get away from it all.

Excellent place to stay. Home was very clean and organized. They hosts are very accommodating and quick to help if there were any questions. The pond is nice, I caught Bass, Crappie and Bluegill. Highly recommend a stay here.
What a wonderful experience for the whole family. Bullfrog catching, fishing, took out the Jon boat, walked the trails, and enjoyed the wildlife book provided. Definitely recommend!

Wow! What an amazing experience! My family (myself, wife, 2 year old daughter) had the best time here. Craig is an amazing host and has the best set up. We felt like we were in our own private island. The space is beautiful and it was a perfect getaway. You’ve got to stay here!

Craig’s guest house is beautiful. The grounds are immaculately kept and it feels like you’re staying in a park. The guest house is next to the main house, connected by a deck walkway, but it really felt like we had the whole place to ourselves. The screened in porch overlooking the lake was our favorite spot—perfect for morning coffee. We saw deer every day, as well as so many birds—including hummingbirds and orioles. We also fished in the pond quite a bit and caught a fair amount of fun-sized largemouth bass (which is what we were fishing for) as well as a couple black crappie (all catch and release). Craig even had a jon boat with a trolling motor ready for us to use. We went to the other side of the pond one evening and caught a bunch of bass. So fun! We also hiked the trail around the pond and through the woods—again, maintained as well as most city parts. The house is pretty remote though, with limited cell signal. It’s about 15-20 to a nearby small town via gravel roads. But it was a nice getaway with lots to do. I will mention we struggled to get my wife in her wheelchair up the three stairs to the deck, to get in the house. We brought a portable ramp, but it was more steep than I anticipated. Not Craig’s fault though. This house didn’t claim to be ADA compliant, but I figured it would work well enough for our needs. And once inside, it did. I’m just not sure I’d be able to return here with my wife and her wheelchair. Still a 5-star stay. Such a peaceful and serene setting.
This is the most peaceful getaway. This was our second time and we will definitely be back again!
Peace, beautiful flora and fauna are exquisite at this place. An immaculate home with every detail provided. Loved our stay--it was perfect and wonderful.

I needed a peaceful experience to decompress from life’s demands.
As it turned out, I couldn’t have chosen a more ideal experience with that end in mind.
My daughter and son-in-law stayed there and highly recommended it. Glad I took their advice.
The hosts were warm and friendly.
Craig walked me through everything.
The house was incredibly well stocked and just immaculately kept as was the entire property.
There’s a walk-out sliding glass door on the lower level directly below the screened-in porch facing the lake.
The property was beyond belief in that I felt such a tranquil vibe. It’s a large property that’s landscaped to perfection. The wildlife is abundant and the fishing was incredible.
I had exclusive access to two small boats; one with an electric trolling motor.
The pond/lake has an abundant supply of nice fish.
I caught easily over 50 fish; mostly large mouth bass.
The property is literally a very secluded oasis in the middle of nowhere.
The screened-in porch is like a wildlife show with a crescendo of soothing wildlife sounds that increase as day turns into night. It’s a second-floor elevation that’s difficult for the animals to see you because of the screen. There were constant visits by deer walking past the porch and they weren’t skittish in the least.
I was able to park a few feet from the front door, which was very convenient.
I will definitely book another stay this year.

The location, the property, and the home are all amazing!! This is our second stay on this property and we look forward to visiting again for many years to come. The home is spotlessly clean and extremely well equipped. All the furniture and the beds are all very comfortable. The property is a slice of heaven and the view from the screened in porch is stunning. It’s a joy to wake up and enjoy our coffee while watching deer with babies walking through the yard along with squirrels, raccoons and a myriad of birds. The catch and release fishing in the pond is excellent and the use of the skiff or kayak gives you an even more intimate experience of the environment. Craig is very responsive to any questions or needs and provided necessary information due to storms and weather concerns. During our stay it felt like we had the entire property to ourselves as we rarely saw our host even though the main home is just next door. If you are looking for comfort with peace and quiet you will find it here.

This is our second visit to Craig’s resort and it certainly won’t be our last. The facilities are great and the grounds are well kept. You can totally relax, hike around the woods , fish, or birdwatch. Everything is at your own pace. Craig always makes you feel comfortable and relaxed. Highly recommended.
We caught 52 fish! Such a beautiful scenery! What more can you ask for! Great relaxation and very accommodating with the guest house!!!

Enjoyed the guest house for a long weekend. Craig was a great host, met me for check-in and showed me the very well stocked house.
The location is beautiful- we enjoyed the lake, the trails through the woods, the porch and the well equipped kitchen. Everything was comfortable and clean. A great way to get away from it all.
Beautiful home in a peaceful location. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Absolutely the best place for anyone that want peace, quiet, and serenity! Excellent fishing! Caught 24 fish in 2 days, including a 7 pound bass! Guesthouse was immaculate! Hosts very friendly! Nature sounds in the morning while having coffee n the screen porch! Beautiful view! Will return for sure!!!

Craig and Neneth were very friendly and quick to provide any help we needed. The guest house was clean and fully stocked. Couldn't have asked for more. Would love to be back to spend some more time around the lake.

Craig was helpful right away in giving a tour of the place. He was quick to respond to messages. The place was very clean and fully stocked with everything you could possibly need. The atmosphere was serene and so peaceful. Trails are cleared and easy to walk and follow. We will definitely be back.

This property is gorgeous, and Craig is a wonderful host. The guest house is right next to the main house, but the hosts respect the privacy of their guests. We stayed for a book lover's weekend, and we appreciated the stocked, clean, and beautiful accommodations.

Clean, spacious, and well stocked! We enjoyed our time there. It is quiet and away from noise. The only thing that surprised us was that the owners are literally next door. We knew they would be on the same property, but didn't know they would be so close. They were great though and left us alone but were willing to talk if we initiated it. We were able to enjoy a couple days of quiet away from city noise and take walks in the woods. It gave us the break we were looking for.

Craig is a great host. He communicated with us leading up to our stay and was flexible with our arrival time, as we were visiting family nearby for Christmas. The property is beautiful, clean and peaceful. Lots of wildlife around the lake and plenty of space to explore and enjoy. Would love to return in the summer to do some fishing and boating. My family lives in Roseville, the next town over, and they were so excited to learn about Craig's place for future visits or family get togethers. We hope to return in the future.
Amazing place, view, people. So worth staying here!
This has become our home away from home. We could not ask for better hosts or a more peaceful retreat for us! ❤️🙏🏼
Third time staying here. Able to get out on the lake this time on the boat - great time! So nice and relaxing inside and out.

When you arrive you will marvel at how well everything is kept up and how welcome you are made to feel. Craig is truly a super host! All of the amenities are supplied so you only need to bring food and drink. There are walking paths, a lake and two small boats, flowers, and often deer and turkeys. You can be active or just sit and read. We are coming again!

This was our 3rd or 4th time (I can’t keep track) staying at the property and I know we will be back again and again! It’s the perfect distance from the QC and they have thought of everything to make your stay comfortable and memorable. The kitchen and bathroom is stocked with must haves and I love the extra touches such ice cube trays filled, bottled water cold in the fridge, bathroom stocked with extra toothbrushes etc. The beds are comfortable and the house is always spotless.
We love this property because it has a private pond which has a lot of fish (bluegill, bass and crappy) and you are almost guaranteed to catch at least 1 fish! This trip we caught at least 30 fish (I’m talking 1 to 2 lb bass). We had use of the boat with a trolling motor and kayak along with 2 piers to fish off of. In addition to fishing, they have a beautiful gardens on their property and a walking path that is a must. It took us 30 min to walk on the path so it’s great to get your steps in!
Craig is very quick to respond to messages and questions. His property is a family favorite and a place we plan on returning soon. Thank you!
Perfect host, perfect accommodations, perfect surroundings. I’m already planning a return trip.
Craig and the location, absolutely amazing. I wished I booked til instead of Sunday.

I now know what a Super Host means! The bar is high. Craig's place is amazing. Clean, inviting, tasteful, thoughtful, peaceful, comfortable. My family and I wanted for nothing during our visit. The grounds are spectacular and the house it too. Thank you Craig and Neneth we truly appreciated all the care and thoughfulness you put into being hosts.
Craig is a fantastic host with a lovely place!

This was the best Airbnb experience we've had yet, and we've had plenty. Craig and Neneth met us upon our arrival. They showed us the guesthouse and then left us to enjoy our stay. The place was clean, more well-stocked than any other rental, and the private lake was so great. We fished and made use of the boat and trolling motor that the hosts graciously allowed us to use. The patio was also very relaxing. Communication was top-notch, and they clearly cared about our happiness and enjoyment of nature.

This house is by far the best airbnb we've ever rented. The property is magnificent—even more beautiful than the photos suggest. Craig maintains the land and home in perfect condition. There's an amazing garden right outside the guest house door and the calming lake is just steps away. If you're looking for peace and quiet and a respite from the energy of everyday life, this is your ideal place.
The host was great. The house was really nice. Although it’s a drive to town, the flower gardens, lake and house were well worth it. I would love to go back again for a longer stay.
Very nice place. Great host.
Craig was awesome to work with!

This was a beautiful, relaxing stay and we had a wonderful time. The home was incredibly clean. Craig was very helpful, responsive and accommodating. We loved the private lake and were able to use the boat and kayak. We watched the sunset out on the lake and loved the screen patio at night. We saw deer, baby fawns, raccoons, hawks, cardinals, chipmunks and more. We caught lots of fish for catch and release the next morning. There is also a beautiful hiking trail. Thank you for our stay. We had a wonderful time.
Incredible stay!! Screened in porch allows for the incredible sounds of nature!!

As advertised and overall excellent quality, beautiful property, peaceful surroundings and great provisions. The owners live nearby but are discreet and not obtrusive. Rather they are hospitable and helpful when needed and are careful to give you your space so you can relax and enjoy your time. They allowed us to use all their lake equipment (and kept charging the boat battery for my son), they keep their property very well maintained, the house so comfortable and peaceful and the walks through the timber were relaxing. We saw lots of wildlife and made lots of new family memories. Highly recommend!

My fiance and I loved this guest house. Craig was very nice, he showed us around and even set up the boat so we could use it during our stay. The place was very clean and we felt very comfortable the whole time we were there. This is definitely an Aribnb we'll be returning to in the future.

Absolutely spectacular! The cabin is comfortable and very clean. Craig was an attentive and friendly host. And the property is spectacular. We enjoyed vibrant night sounds and a gorgeous sunrise hike along mowed trails. The woods were in full bloom and so lovely! We will be back for sure!

Craig is a wonderful host very accommodating. The property is well maintained and well stocked. Craig has thought of everything and has gone to great lengths to make sure your stay is as enjoyable as possible. It is great to see all of the wildlife in the area as well. The lake is one of the best parts. Walmart and Target are about 30 min away so I would suggest getting what you need first. Craig’s place is great for anyone that enjoys nature and wants to get away from the sometime stressful “city life”

This place is AMAZING! It was my second time staying here and I hope not my last. The house was thoughtfully designed, with everything you would need conveniently there for you. Ice cold water bottles, tooth brushes and toothpaste, Starbucks coffee, and lots of fresh towels and linens! The property is also beautiful. Overall amazing.

The peace and quiet of this country setting is perfect! The guest house has a wonderful screened porch with beautiful views of the lovely yard and a small private lake. We enjoyed reading there in the sun, observing several different kinds of birds, and listening to the bird calls. There are trails in the meadow and adjoining woods for relaxing walks. We could also have used the rowboat or the kayak, but we chose to just relax and take long walks. The kitchen and bathrooms were well stocked and the beds were very comfortable. We appreciated the bottled water in the refrigerator and the good coffee in the cabinet. We brought in our own food for our evening meal and our morning breakfast, so we wouldn’t have to leave and miss any of the peace and quiet.

Second stay here - and that is consistent with all of the great reviews! Well maintained inside and out. Walking around the lake and in the woods was so pleasant and relaxing. Red winged blackbirds, geese and a heron all there by the lake. All good, all good.
Craig’s guest house is the perfect retreat for a quiet, relaxing weekend. It was exceptionally clean and had everything we needed for our stay. The actual guest house was better than the pictures!

The best getaway spot! It's secluded right on a lake. It's so quiet you can think out there. All the wild life is amazing. We sat in the screen porch at night just listening to all the different animals. Nice trails, and we found a great spot on the other side of the lake to just hang out and have a picnic. Absolutely breathtaking.
Really nice place with a private lake. We watched Canada geese land and takeoff and honk. All sorts of animal sounds at dusk - very cool. I definitely recommend a stay here.

This was hands down the best rental I've ever had. Craig and Neneth put in so much thought into making our stay comfortable. The house was spotless and had all the things you need to feel at home away from home. The kitchen and bathroom were fully stocked. They had games and a useful book about birds. They equipped the home with nice things, so we felt like we were really at home...not at a rental. The home is situated in front of a beautiful lake, next to amazing woods. We used the kayak and row boat, hiked, used the fire pit. Craig took us out for a tour of the woods and we had a great connection with him about nature and all the animals and plants on the property. He showed amazing hospitality and kindness. We encountered all kinds of wildlife, including deer, all kinds of birds, and even coyotes. We really felt like we had a little piece of heaven all to ourselves. Through our encounters with Craig and his family, and with the nature surrounding us 24/7, we left better people than we arrived as. Thank you, Craig and Neneth for a truly memorable stay.
Absolutely loved it here. Great place to unwind and get away from city life.

You will definitly love this place. It is off the beaten path but it is soooo worth the trip ! You will get a chance to unplug & plug back into yourself or family ! This is life changing experience one worth your time & money !
Great for seclusion and catching wild life in action if your patient enough, also loved the property size it was lot to look at
The guest house is as good as advertised. The place was very clean and quiet, and the trails around the lake are beautiful. We really enjoyed our time here.
Third time staying here and as always everything is perfect! Thanks again guys! Hope to see you next year!
Our stay was just what we needed; places to what and explore in the woods and prairie, comfortable home with everything we needed, great hospitality. We will be coming back!
Extremely thoughtful, clean, well stocked place to stay on beautiful grounds.

We recently returned from Craig's BEAUTIFUL guest house after a 4 night stay. Upon arrival Craig was there to greet us and take us inside to show us EVERYTHING necessary for our stay. We could not believe how wonderfully decorated and CLEAN this home was. The setting and view of the stunning yard and lake was picture perfect. It was also so peaceful. We enjoyed walking on the trails around the lake and in the woods every evening and seeing all the deer. We also made a fire in the fire pit provided each evening. Craig made sure it would be easy to start the fire with DRY kindling and logs. We enjoyed watching the Presidential recaps on the satellite TV. Don't worry about forgetting anything as they provide anything you could think of. The bed was so comfortable as were the sheets, blankets and pillows. We have stayed at many home rentals and this was one of the BEST. This trip was wonderful and we could not have picked a more perfect place to stay.

Very nice and stylish!! Beautiful view of the lake. Hosts are soooo kind and accommodating. It was a very nice place to stay. Only complaint was weird furnace noises - even so the space is beautiful and well worth the money, especially for more than 2 people (there are multiple nice bedrooms and lots of space). Every corner of the house is cared for, cleaned, and stylish. Very nice place to stay.

We spent three nights at Craig and Neneth's place in western Illinois. Surrounded by a forest with wonderful hiking trails and a lake right in front of the guest house, this made for a fantastic experience. Our hosts have thought of everything and I almost wish that I had forgotten something just to be amazed that they had anticipated this! It is an exceptionally comfortable and pristinely clean rental and the communication with Craig is prompt, pleasant, and always helpful. If you are looking for a place to escape where you can hike, swim, fish, boat, study nature, or simply sit on the fantastic screened-in porch reading or gazing at the lake, this is without doubt the place. We are so pleased that we visited Craig and Neneth's place and recommend it without hesitation. We sincerely hope we get the opportunity to visit again. Thank you!
The view is very pretty. The walking trails around the property were very nice. The house is very nice. All in all a very relaxing time!
Our third stay at this property and it was perfect as usual. An absolutely fantastic getaway.
Craig and Nedeth have a great place! They kept it well prepared for anything you might need or forgot on your trip. The walk through the woods was amazing and we hope to return!

This little bit of heaven tucked away in the farmlands exceeded our expectations. So private and relaxing. The view from the front room and screened in porch of the little lake is wonderful. Craig was very helpful, and available but left us to be on our own, which is what we wanted. Perfection.

This place exceeds every expectation. The location is gorgeous and the paths around the property are perfect for some light exploring. The screened in porch quickly became our favorite place to hang out and listen to the sounds of nature around us. Craig was a wonderful host and truly made us feel right at home. We would absolutely stay here again!

This place was amazing and the perfect retreat to get away from the city for a few days. Our hosts were super accommodating, friendly, and very helpful. What a gem! This sparkling clean getaway guest house had the most incredible views, was wonderfully comfortable, and equipped with everything I needed (and more besides). The perfect space for a retreat; exactly what I had hoped for. I loved it.

We absolutely loved our time at Craig’s place. Our 9 year old boy loved swimming and fishing in the lake as well as exploring the grounds. The house was spacious, comfortable and Craig provided pretty much everything we needed. It’s the perfect city escape and we will definitely be coming back!
Wonderful space with great view, great outdoor, privacy, nature sounds, amenities, and relaxing.
This was a great stay! The property is beautiful, nice trails to walk and a lovely home. Craig was very communicative and helpful. Highly recommended!

Wonderful place to go for a quiet, peaceful vacation. A beautiful guest house that will exceed your expectations both inside and out. We were sad when our trip was over and will plan for a longer return visit in the near future.

I loved this beautiful home. Gorgeous scenery, clean, great amenities, beautifully decorated. Craig was a great host. I will definitely return and recommend to anyone.

This place is beautiful. It has everything you need for. Comfortable stay. The kids loved the swings and picking wild berries. My husband loved the fishing and I enjoyed the peace in this place. I would definitely go back!

This place is amazing. The trails and lake are beautiful. Saw a wild turkey, a snapping turtle, frogs and fish. The house was so clean and they had everything you could need. I overpacked and ended up not needing half the stuff I brought. Craig and his wife were so kind and flexible. I will definitely be coming back in the fall.

Craig’s place was the absolutely perfect pandemic getaway from city life. It had everything we were craving for a summer escape to nature. The home was perfectly clean and had all the kitchen and bath amenities of home allowing us to cook all our meals seamlessly including access to a grill. We’d recommend a stay here and can’t wait to come back!

What a great space! The hospitality was wonderful and they were very welcoming and showed us around. The screened in porch was such an amazing aspect to sit out in the morning and drink coffee. So many extra touches that you don’t usually see in other Airbnbs. I can’t wait to go back and explore the area more!

Very private and beautiful area to stay in. The check in and check out was easy. Didn’t see the home owners again after check in so it felt very secluded. Beautiful pond with tons of wildlife in the area. Not a ton of place to eat unless you drive 15-25 minutes so it is easier to just bring your own food. The hiking is fun. It’s in the country so bring bug spray (in summer). Would definitely stay here again!
This really is a magical place. This was our second stay, and we will be back. If you are looking to slow down and drink in quiet in a gorgeous setting, this is a wonderful choice.

I booked this guest house based on reviews saying it was a "hidden gem" and they were not wrong! This guest house has the most beautiful view of a private lake, a large yard (with a great swing out back which was a happy surprise for my toddler who has been missing the playgrounds!), and our stay was outstanding. The house is very well kept and cozy, and has the most amazing views from the screened in porch. We loved eating meals while listening to the birds and watching the deer. The property has beautifully mowed walking trails and acres of woods to explore. The private dock was also a great place to sit and watch the water, along with a sea kayak and the floats we brought. The water wasn't great for swimming, but the cool breeze from the water along with all the other great things the property has to offer, it wasn't missed! We brought a kiddie pool anyways and had a blast in the yard. Craig was always quick with responses and tips for exploring. We look forward to returning for another trip soon, we all had a blast!
Third time and will be visiting again, lots of new additions to the property. Overall excellent!!
Hosts are accommodating and friendly. The lake and surrounding areas are lovely. Great spot for fishing and hiking.
Great screened in porch to relax and enjoy the view! Quiet and peaceful, a lovely getaway to unplug.
We had a magical time. Truly relaxing.

Very beautiful property. It was a very relaxing escape from today's environment. They provide most anything that you may have forgotten to bring with. If you love nature as I do this is the place for you. Many different types of plants and wild life also trails to explore around the property. The pictures just do not do this property justice. We spent 12 beautiful days enjoying the amazing views, sounds and all the animals. We loved seeing, hearing and experiencing all the wildlife. We look forward to staying here for years to come.
Very clean and just as expected!
Quiet, very nice grounds, clean great tv channels comfortable beds

Craig's place was our first Airbnb experience. We were amazed when we arrived because the pictures don't do this place as much justice as it deserves! Our stay was immaculate in all ways! Always a pleasure to stay here.

Place was all what was expected

This was a great rental. Super clean and everything was in great working order. We will stay again. Thanks.

Would definitely stay here again!

Home away from home! Great hiking trail & fishing. Prepare for Deer Sightings. Perfect amenities in the kitchen and bath with washer & dryer. Time well spent with family. Host is very accommodating and friendly. Highly suggest!

They are very nice and accommodating, respond quickly and take pride in their property. We can’t wait to return!

5 plus stars does not even come close to this oasis of beauty and serenity!! Private pristine...pretty and positively PERFECT! THANK YOU CRAIG AND NENETH...AND YOUR AMAZING KITTY AUBREY! Nature at it's best. It was the perfect weekend to just unwind. We will definitely return.
Spectacular setting offered a serene retreat for our visit with family. Craig and his wife were gracious, thoughtful and all around nice. Private Pond/Lake views are beautiful!

Beautiful area, clean, comfortable space where you can just relax and take in the scenery. Gorgeous property inside and out, wonderful amenities and quiet hosts. The lighting is a little harsh, but everything else was a sweet soft landing for my travel weary bones! I enjoyed a fabulous nights rest, the incredible landscape, a belly full of wild blueberries and meals on the porch tremendously, thanks again!
Their private guest house is beautiful! Amazing space, great hospitality and the best views!

An amazing place if you want to get away to nature and have a quiet experience in a comfortable setting. Sparkling clean and everything you can imagine is provided. Already booking a return to this truly unique place. Thank you so much for making our stay fantastic and relaxing.

This was my second time at the lake house but this time I brought my kids. Craig & his wife made sure to provide everything the kids may have needed & they also took the time to teach us how to fish. This is a gem of a find. A place to relax in the tranquility that nature has to provide. Craig is an excellent host. We will return when we have more time. You will not be disappointed.

An immaculate home in a spectacularly beautiful and peaceful location - even more beautiful than the pictures. Accommodating hosts, can’t wait to return.

The pictures don't do it justice. The space and the area are fantastic. This, after one visit, is our new favorite getaway location. Craig and his wife do a great job and provide for a wonderful experience!
This place was gorgeous! We felt like we had our own little bit of paradise for a couple days. Amazing views, walking path, plant and wildlife, etc.

Absolutely fabulous place to stay! Exceptionally clean and wonderful extra touches throughout! We only wish we could have stayed longer! This is amazingly quiet and beautiful! You will definitely enjoy your stay!

All of the space was sparkling clean, and plenty of extra linens for a long stay (we only got to enjoy two nights, but wished for more!). Would definitely recommend a stay here!
This is the second time we’ve stayed at Craig’s place. Second time was just as positive of an experience as the first.

Our short stay in this guest house was simply AMAZING. Craig & his wife are great hosts & provided more amenities than than we expected. The guest house is spacious & the views are beautiful. The sounds of nature were overwhelming & calming. This was a much needed break from the hustle & bustle of city life! We will definitely be returning before the year ends. Thank you for your hospitality!

We spent a week at Craig's house while visiting our son who attends Monmouth College. What a great week! While out of the way the location is still easy enough to get to and convenient enough to several of the smaller towns in the area that travel was easy. The fishing in the lake and the hiking in the nearby woods was a great way to spend time with family and friends. Will definitely be back!
This place is amazing. It was even better than we thought it was going to be!! Really hope to be back again soon.
Craig was an amazing host with a beautiful home! Would highly recommend Craig and we'll definitely be back!

this stay couldn't have gone better! the house was beautiful and so was the location. there was plenty of amenities more than we both expected. would recommend to anybody wanting to get away for a bit.

Craig's place was beautiful! My guests and I had a great time and we're very comfortable. Craig and his wife were really really nice. the place was exceptionally clean and had everything we needed for the weekend. would definitely stay again!

Can not say enough great things about Craig, his wife and their home! The setting is so peaceful and picturesque! The trails were well maintained and fairly flat-- perfect for our jogging stroller. The guest house was meticulously clean and had anything you could ever think of!
We enjoyed hiking on the property, visiting Camp's Orchard down the road, and stopping at the Amish grocery store outside of town for the BEST homemade donuts!! Would stay again in a heartbeat!
Thanks, again!

We had a very relaxing and peaceful weekend. The photos are extremely accurate, the surroundings are spectacular and this is a great location to unwind and let go of stress. Craig and Neneth have thought of everything you could possibly need.

This beautiful property was a great, relaxing family getaway from our crazy lives. We enjoyed hiking and sitting on the screened in porch overlooking the lake. The house was so clean. It was just what my family needed!
What beautiful place to stay. Highly recommended. Craig and his wife are very accommodating

Craig’s place was awesome! The property itself was so stunning. They have their own property away from all the hustle and bustle. The beds were comfortable and towels were very soft. Craig was always available if we needed him and responded very fast. They are such great people! Before we left, we talked to them for a while and had such a great time. If we didn’t live out of state we would be back as soon as possible. Next time were in the area, we will be sure to stay with Craig! Thank you for everything!

Going to Craig's home was a beautiful getaway. We enjoyed the hiking and quiet, and Craig was able to give us some tips on places to eat around the area. He was kind and thoughtful, plus the house was exceptionally clean and had everything we needed. We'll be coming back, for sure!

Peaceful is the first word that comes to mind when I think of this place. We loved sitting on the screened in porch and watching the wildlife and enjoying the peace and quiet. Such a sweet country gem!
Beautiful location! Hidden home where you really know you cannot be found! There will be another vacation spent here for sure! Friendly owner ready to help with your stay!

This place is great! The definition of "hidden gem." If you're a city dweller, this property will feel very far off the beaten path but it is worth the drive! Sparkling clean and comfortable home. Loved the screened in porch with beautiful views. Quiet and peaceful setting with great wildlife watching. Craig and Nenneth are gracious and lovely hosts!

Imagine you need detox from a stressful few months, and you just want to be in nature to relax, fish, hike, or maybe do a bit of birding. This is the place - you can do it all on one property and ignore the rest of the world. That is exactly what we did this past weekend. We brought groceries to cook and grill so we didn't need to leave this slice of heaven. The fishing was so wonderful that my husband doesn't want me to tell you just HOW good. :) Let's just say it exceeded all expectations. Craig and his wife were so helpful, but also were careful to give us privacy. The house is spotless and thoughtfully stocked with necessities in both kitchen and bathrooms. Though there is no WiFi, we easily were able to access the 4G cellular network. There is DirectTV and a large television, though we didn't use it. This well-built house has a huge screened in porch overlooking the lake with a beautiful view. It was our favorite place to eat breakfast and sip coffee. Bedrooms are cozy and well-appointed with fluffy linens and plenty of storage space for luggage. We had asked Craig if he would recommend a nearby corn stand on our way in, but he surprised with fresh and local corn and tomatoes to enjoy with our dinners. We will definitely be back!

The guest house is a great place to enjoy nature, loved watching the hummingbirds and deer as well as fishing. The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed for cooking and I loved the huge screened in porch!!!

A truly indescribable place hosted by great people. The entire place was a majestic and peaceful experience shared with my loved one. The hosts thought of all details from big to small and even had more to offer! They were extremely accommodating and were very thoughtful. The hiking trail was amazing and sitting by the like was like no other. They are truly great people with an amazing place. We cannot wait to go back again and spend another unique weekend together.
Craig's home is amazing. We enjoyed the quiet beauty of our surroundings. It was a great place to go to relax in peace.

This place is beautiful! Wonderful if you’d like to be surrounded by nature. There was a lot to do including hiking the trails, fishing, and simply relaxing looking at the wonderful views! The hosts are absolutely amazing!

There is a gas grill to use and the kitchen has everything you would need to make a meal. The house was very clean and had enough towels, extra blankets and sheets which was nice if you have more people stay.
The property is absolutely serene and beautiful. I can tell that they take great care of their landscaping and gardens. They have a good size pond right on their property with a dock along with hiking trails. My husband and I love to fish so I was pleasantly happy that they let us use their canoe for the weekend. We caught many large bass, crappe and blue gill using lures and bait. It's a great pond to fish in!
One thing to note is that their house is right next door and connected through a deck/walkway. This did not bother us at all since they are very lovely people and gave us our privacy while we were there. We would love to return again soon with our kids...or just another getaway just the two of us! Thank you for letting us stay at your guest house!
This stay was great - hosts are friendly and very hospitable - orienting us what's around towns nearby and of their property. House was very clean! Great place to stay for outdoor lovers!

Booked this place for our first wedding anniv. Grateful to our outstanding hosts. They were very thoughtful about me and my wife who’s pregnant at the moment. It’s so quiet that my wife and I were able to talk about us and spend time with each other. There’s a lot of things to do too like fishing, grilling, hiking. Wife and i are planning to bring our bow and arrow next time. Highlight for us is the over-looking lake view from the living area. That satisfied us to just stay on the couch and watch the view outside or occasionally watch a movie. Will definitely book this place again with our family.

What an oasis in the middle of corn country! Unfortunately we really were only staying the night to attend our son's graduation a d then go back to Chicago. I can't recommend staying here enough, especially if you want a respite from the city. It's completely isolated and quiet in beautiful pastoral countryside. Just don't forget to go grocery shopping before you head towards it as there isn't a store for miles. If we ever find ourselves in the area again, we will absolutely stay again!

Amazing place to stay, the host was very accommodating and genuinely wanted to make our stay enjoyable, they are really great people. Lovely home in a quiet neighborhood but walking distance to stores. It had plenty of storage and was well appointed.
Black Squirrel Inn was a great AirBnB. Very clean and well stocked. Loved the driveway for off road parking. Nice front porch with a swing. Would definitely recommend.

great house! very clean and spacious! fresh and clean. love the modern combination with good hearted messages and decor. Sonia was immediate to respond as i extended my stay two more times. this is a nice house in a good neighborhood with friendly and good neighbors! thank you Sonia!

This is a lovely home that accommodated our every need. I would definitely stay here again.

It was just my wife and I on this stay and we loved this little place full of character. Everything was as described and a little more. Love that they have some coffee and other small items in a cute basket ready for our enjoyment. It was very peaceful; just perfect for what we needed.

This is a reminder that most older homes do not have open concept areas for larger crowds over 4 people. I had 6 people one night & we could not fit in the living room together to play board/card/video games, so the next night, we went over to another bigger AirB&B home to hang out. I would recommend owners making use of the empty basement to create into a game room with a pool table, a dart board on the wall, or even a projector screen with a larger couch/reclyners for a movie room. The neighbor's home to the left looked sketchy & I truly didn't feel safe. Even my guests felt uneasy about the neighbor home next door. However, having cameras on the front door & the back door made us feel a bit better.
Great place to stay. Very clean, great location, fantastic hosts.

Perfect for the three of us. My husband and I both had small tables by the king size bed for our cpaps. My brother had a single bed in the other bedroom. Two bathrooms helped with three of us there. We really enjoyed the house. It was very comfortable and easy to find. The kitchen and bathroom had everything we needed. I would recommend this house to my friends and family!

The house was comfortable and suited our needs perfectly. It was well stocked with board games and we had a very pleasant stay. Matthew and Stephanie responded quickly to any questions we had! Highly recommended this wonderful home.
